text: Robert Powell (; born 1 June 1944) is an English actor. He is known for playing Jesus Christ in Jesus of Nazareth (1977). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Robert Powell's Holby City profile at What's on TV Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Robert Powell
